issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description: 
While testing KitchenSink, Base UI>Animation>Animation Points, the "stop animation" button is rendered without a bottom border. See attached image. This only occurs on the iPhone 3 GS.

Steps to reproduce:
 1) Install KS onto device
 2) Navigate to Base UI>Animation>Animation Points
 3) Examine the "Stop Animation" button

Result:
Button is rendered incompletely

Expected Result:
Fully formed button

Notes: 
OCCURS in 1.6.2
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink: Base UI>Animation>Animation Points, iPhone 3GS renders "stop animation" button with no bottom border
fields.environment: iPhone 3GS (3.1.2) , Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201106011734, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X rc9515533

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
